name: Slayer (itch) (wesslo)
description:
As a tide of malicious slime appear, will you be able to cull their forthcoming?

When the Iron Spinners, Bone Alisas and Zombie Samurai Archers ascend from The Void, will you withstand their relentless assault?

Will you be the Slayer?

------CREDITS:--------

SFX: "Impact" by Iwan 'qubodup' Gabovitch (http://opengameart.org/users/qubodup)

Music: 5 Action chiptunes by Juhani Junkala (https://opengameart.org/content/5-chiptunes-action)

Main menu music: "Borealis" by Cosmin Mirza (cosminmirza.com)

Tesla spark SFX: Brian MacIntosh (https://opengameart.org/content/electricity-sound-effects-0)

Victory theme: (https://opengameart.org/content/victory)

Bomb SFX: (https://opengameart.org/content/bombexplosion8bit)
